value:
$nMPID_双界ドロテア|So many people around, and in such
fancy garb. You don't happen to
know any of them, do you, Lene?$k$pOoh! What about that guy with the
blue hair? He's kind of good looking,
isn't he?

$nMPID_リーン|This castle and courtyard seem a bit
brighter, don't they? Of course they
do, now! They've become our stage!

$nMPID_双界ドロテア|These clothes are so easy to slip into,
it's incredible. They seem to slide on
no matter how you approach them.

$nMPID_リーン|Hey, watch it! You touch me, and I'll
touch you right back! ...Hyah!

$nMPID_双界ドロテア|Lene is a great dancer... Much better
than I am. But I've got my voice and
good looks, so we're the perfect pair!

$nMPID_リーン|Oh, hey! I can get a lot of gold around
here, $Nf said!

$nMPID_双界ドロテア|I may have no crest or noble name
to swear on, but...on the Mittelfrank
Opera Company, I will triumph!

$nMPID_リーン|Agustria's most renowned dancer and
the most magnificent songstress in
Fódlan have combined their powers.$k$pThere's no way we can lose!

$nMPID_双界ドロテア|Oh, come now, Lene. If you keep
making that face, it's going to stick
like that. Don't worry!

$nMPID_双界ドロテア|I will use this to better myself...
Its light will guide me toward
my future!

I am Dorothea of the Mittelfrank
Opera Company. Lene and I have
similar pasts, so we've teamed up.$k$pThe two of us working together won't
be a problem for you, will it?

$nMPID_リーン|We put on a nice performance today,
didn't we! Oh, Dorothea...
Who's the girl you were talking to?$k$p$nMPID_双界ドロテア|Huh? Oh, it was nothing. She was
just saying she looks up to us.$k$p...And she wanted to know who
was more popular between us.$k$p$nMPID_リーン|Whaaat?! I think I stood out a bit
more today, but...what did you
tell her?$k$p$nMPID_双界ドロテア|Tee hee! I told her the person who'd
know best is $Nu!$k$p$nMPID_リーン|Oh really? Hm. Well, in that case...
Hey, $Nu!$k$pI see you there! Don't try to escape!
What did you tell that little girl who
was asking about us?!$k$p$nMPID_双界ドロテア|Yes, who DID you choose? Me, THE
songstress of Fódlan, Dorothea? Or
Agustria's best dancer, Lene? Hm?
たあっ
いくわよ
きゃああっ
Oww...
Why!
$nMPID_二人|A curse on you!
$nMPID_二人|Let's give them a show. Yeah!
$nMPID_双界ドロテア|All eyes on us!
$nMPID_リーン|Watch your step!
Time to... Bow out...
Good luck!
You can't lose!
"With this dance..." "You'll be enchanted!"
"Let's show off our moves." "And be bold!"
Giggle
"Perfect for dancing." "Perfect for us!"
Where to?
Let's captivate them.
And away!
$nMPID_双界ドロテア|All right, one more dance!
$nMPID_リーン|How do I look?

$nMPID_双界ドロテア|Beautiful, Lene. You move with
such grace.

$nMPID_リーン|*giggle* Thank you, Dorothea.
That means a lot coming from
a professional.

$nMPID_双界ドロテア|Former professional. My years as
a songstress feel like a lifetime ago.

$nMPID_リーン|Even so, you're so talented! You
got to perform up on a big stage,
didn't you?

That's so impressive! I wish
I could dance in front of an
audience like you!

$nMPID_双界ドロテア|Well, there must be a stage
somewhere here in Askr, but...$k$pI'm not sure the Order of Heroes
would appreciate a performance
right now.

$nMPID_リーン|I guess you're right. They might
get upset if they think we aren't
contributing.

$nMPID_双界ドロテア|That said, it seems unreasonable
for the Order to be upset...$k$p...with someone who is contributing
the best way they know how.

$nMPID_リーン|Hmm... Maybe we could say the
performance is a reward for the
other Heroes?

$nMPID_双界ドロテア|Right! In that case, how does this
sound? We'll work to end the fighting
here in Askr...

Then, when the world is at peace,
we'll ask Prince Alfonse to set up
a stage where you can perform!

$nMPID_リーン|That would be wonderful! I'm sure
the other Heroes could use a show to
lift their spirits after all that fighting!

But, Dorothea, you'll dance with me,
won't you? Oh! And sing too?

$nMPID_双界ドロテア|It would be my honor, Lene!
I should make sure I can still
hit the high notes...

$nMPID_リーン|Yay! It'll be so much fun! *giggle*
I should work hard now to make
that dream a reality!
